113212.content:
Yes, you had always loved fantasy games as well as novels on the like, so why not remake the world in that image? You thought about a world filled with magic and monsters, ruins and other places to explore, and adventurers mingling with people that remained closer to home. There’s no telling what fun you could have in a world like that. You focused on it, and willed the stone to make it so. The heartbeat and warming sensations were stronger this time, making it feel like the emerald was almost alive in your hand.

The effect came to a crescendo as the world around you started to glow and smear. Before long, it felt like you were inside an enormous lava lamp. The strange view stopped in an instant, leaving you in a dark void.

A brief moment of panic swelled in your chest. Had something gone wrong, had the stone misinterpreted something about your wish? Then a booming voice came out of the darkness.

“Greetings adventurer, your journey is about to begin. But before you start, you must decide who you will be. Will you be a mighty warrior, skilled in combat and taking the fight to your foes?” As the voice spoke, a spotlight blazed out and illuminated a mannequin dressed in heavy armor and carrying a sword and shield. “On the other hand, might you prefer stealth and striking from range as a rogue?” A second spotlight showed another mannequin dressed in leather armor and carrying a dagger and a bow. “Lastly, there is also the option of being a mage, drawing on magic and destroying those that stand before you with the elements, or weakening them with more subtle means and even supporting your allies with your magical arts.” A third spotlight showed a robed mannequin wielding a magical staff. “Choose wisely adventurer, for your choice will define much about yourself. Do note that there may be ways to expand on your talents and perhaps even combine your choice with those that you did not, but you will have to find these possibilities on your own.”

With that, the voice went silent, leaving you alone with the illuminated mannequins as your only company in the dark expanse. You looked back and forth between the three choices, your mind sorting through all the choices you had made in previous situations. This felt different though since it was going to be your life, not just that of your character on a screen or paper.

After what felt like an eternity, you made your choice and moved towards the class you wanted. You stepped forward—though it felt more than a little strange stepping on and through nothing—moving towards the mannequin.

When another child found the R.A.I.D. he snatched it up and kept it hidden from his mother. This it wasn't until the child got to school that he decided to turn on the device.

In Mr. Finley's class, the child took the device out and pressed the button to activate it. Mr. Luke Finley seeing one of his students, (who should have been too young to be carrying a smart phone like that) confiscated the phone before the phone could be fully activated.

"I'll give this to your mother at the end of the day," Luke chided him.

Luke planned on talking to the child's mother about phones at school. Regardless, he put it in his desk.

The child didn't want his mother to know about the device. He was sure he would get into trouble, So when class ended, the child wouldn't have brought up geting back his the device. Besides, he had forgotten all about it by then.

Luke discovered the device in his desk after all the students had gone. he picked it up and heard the device announce....

HELLO NEW USER AND WELCOME TO R.A.I.D (Reality Altering Interface Device) this app allows you to swap certain things with others based on the the modes on the screen you will see after this one it is pretty simple to use simply aim the camera at some one and press one of the buttons and then a menu will appear allowing you to be more specific with your swap please enjoy R.A.I.D

Wanting to examine the device at his leisure. Mr. Finley wrote a complex problem on the board for them to solve. Knowing it'd take the smartest in the class at least ten minutes, the average ones 20 or 30, and the last wouldn't manage it.

He ran his eyes over the class. Glaring at each raised head, until they were all intently focused on their books, reading and writing feverishly to get the solution.

- - - - -

It looked like someone had personalised their phone. Or perhaps just running some App he didn't know or recognise. It looked like some form of Snapchat filter. He'd heard vaguely about those, from his nieces and nephews. But it was his first encounter with it himself.

He kept the screen active, tapping and swiping, without confirming anything in particular. The preview pictures looked rather amusing in some cases. The results incredibly convincing, but he wasn't the most up-to-date with tech, so it was a surprise, but not surprising.

Looking to Luke, he decided the best punishment would be using the filters to remake Luke.

Luke Finley decided to mess around with the ‘phone’, by using the ‘filter’ to change himself into a woman. After tapping the initiate change button(which he thought just meant ‘save’) and immediately realized something happened as his hands appeared feminine, with red nail polish on. “What the?” She clapped one of his now feminine hands over his mouth, shocked at the high pitch that came out. Looking down at himself, he saw he was now wearing the same skirt suit he had on the ‘phone’. His hair was in a pony tail, and he felt makeup on his face.

“Mrs. Finley. I’m done.” One student got his...her attention.

‘Mrs.?’ Luke thought. She pulled out her wallet, which had changed into a more feminine design and was now in a purse. Looking at her ID, she saw he was now ‘Lucy Finley, F’. As she saw her new name and gender on her ID, memories flooded into her mind. She was still married to her wife, who happened to be bisexual, and now she was too. In the original reality, his wife was 3 months pregnant. In this reality, she still is, but this time, it was because of a sperm donor, and she had convinced Lucy to become pregnant too, so they could have two kids at once, but she had only succeeded in convincing Lucy a couple weeks ago, so Lucy wasn’t showing yet. As Lucy saw these memories, she looked down at her stomach and places a hand on it. ‘I’m...pregnant?’

1333123.content:
"A lot has changed," Luke thought. "I don't think I'll keep this live, but it might be fun to see what it's like for a little while."

Luke tried to teach his lesson as he always had. As the students worked out the problems, Luke walked around the room checking his students progress and encouraging them to continue.

Luke walked up aisle one which was full of boys. Then down aisle two which was filled with girls. Luke used the age out seating method of alternating the boys and girls in different rows. In second grade, the boys and the girls mostly ignored each other making it easier to keep them in control.

Luke used the opportunity to look over himself. He was wearing shoes with a small heel. They were definitely feminine shoes, but easy to walk in. He didn't wear any socks or hose. His skirt was modest enough to teach in school as it extended pasted his knees, even while he was sitting. The blouse he wore, did have a v-neck, but only a small amount of cleavage could be seen. He was dressed in entirely appropriate lady's apparel for teaching second grade. He even realized after a while that he had earrings in his ears.

When he turned from row three to row four (the row closest to the teacher's desk) he noticed little Taylor Goode. He was doing his work, but something was wrong. He seemed fidgety. Taylor was looking down at his t-shirt for some reason. It looked fine, it was a dark purple crew neck t-shirt with a t-rex on it with a caption that says "Mhahhahhah, Now I'm Unstoppable."

As Luke looked past Taylor to the girl behind him, Luke saw little miss Serena MacGraw.

Luke realized, "Hey what is Taylor doing in a girls row?"

Then it came back to him. Taylor was in a girl's row, because Taylor was a girl. At least she was a few minutes before. Luke wondered if Taylor knew she was a boy now?

Taylor didn't change much from how he remembered her. She was about the same size as before, her face hadn't changed much. The big difference was the length ofher hair. But she might not notice that, as her hair was in a braid before. Now it was simply short and in a boyish cut. She was wearing a t-shirt before, but that one was a little lighter shade of purple, with a cartoon giraffe on it that had a caption that said "You're not even close to my level."

Luke couldn't stay as he was any longer. He had to act before Taylor noticed anything was really wrong. Like what she has in her pants. That would scar her for life if she found out.

Luke takes out the R.A.I.D. to swap his gender back with Taylor.

What happens next?

13332.content:
Luke (Mr. Finley) is a fit six feet tall man . He is 24 years old with a medium build and medium brown hair., He mostly wearings contacts although might wear his glasses depending upon how he is feeling.

He is very sociable with an outgoing personality who relates well with his students. He prefers to teach the younger grades and likes to make is classes fun. His classes are unruly on occasion as he feels he should be stricter with his classes. He hasn't taught for very long and enjoys his work immensely.

Luke didn't know why, but he knew instantly that the R.A.I.D. did as it said it could. That was the R.A.I.D.'s influencing itself on Luke

Luke knew that Brandon, the child who brought the device to school, was too young and irresponsible to own such a thing. Luke knew he couldn't give the device back to him. He thought that he should keep it himself. This was the first indication that the R.A.I.D. didn't just belong to people, but it influenced those who possessed it.

Luke couldn't possibly know that Brandon hadn't used the device, nor that he didn't know what the device did. If Luke was going to keep the device then something had to be done to Brandon such that he wouldn't ask for it or make a big fuss about getting it back.

The students lined up in the yard outside the school every day waiting for the teacher to bring them into class. Responsible students in the fifth grade, watched/monitored these students until the teacher got there to keep the children from getting into too much trouble. The parents of the students (who lived close by) escorted their children to school everyday. Brandon was one of these students.

Everyday, Brandon came to school with his mother, who also pushed Brandon's younger brother in a stroller as he couldn't be left alone. Brandon's younger brother was barely two years old. He couldn't walk well and could only speak a few words.

Brandon (and his little brother) would be Luke's first test subjects.

"Let's get him out of my class and too young to say anything about the R.A.I.D. If I swap Brandon's age and abilities with his brother, then Brandon would be too little to do anything about the loss of his R.A.I.D. He wouldn't even be articulate enough to even ask for it," Luke thought. Brandon would be out of Luke's class. He wouldn't be ready to start attending school again, not even PreK for at least two more years.

When Luke spotted Brandon with his mother and brother, Luke took out the device and selected Brandon and his brother. This was the first time that Luke looked through the options of the device. He found the options well laid out and easy to follow. Luke instinctively knew everything that the device could do.

Finding the proper options, Luke was about to activate the device when he noticed the awareness setting. Luke certainly didn't want Brandon to be aware of what happened. So he chose the highest awareness setting and activated the device.

After the flash was gone, Brandon was a little two year old sucking his thumb in the stroller, whereas his brother was ready to attend school. Brandon's brother wasn't in Luke's class though.

Luke knew something had happened, but he didn't know what. He set the awareness level way to high so that not only didn't Brandon and his brother know anything had changed, but Luke didn't know what had changed either.

Luke would be more careful with the awareness level from now on.

When it was time, Luke hustled his class together and lead them into his room.

Luke decided to be more careful with the device. He was going to make a very small swap with one of the children in his class.

What does he swap?

133323.content:
Before coming down to the yard to fetch his students, Luke put a 'Do Now!' on the board. It was the assignment the students must do the instant they entered the room. It was there to get the kids occupied and quiet immediately. During that time, Luke could deal with any administrative work, like taking the attendance or collecting notes from students who had missed the previous day.

The 'Do Now' said started with his name, Mr. Finley' on top . Then the words Do Now. Under was the problem the students would write down and work on. Below that was the homework for tomorrow. Teachers have been having Do Nows to start their classwork probably since chalkboards were made standard in every classroom.

Luke directed his students up the stairs, through the hall and to his room. They all knew where to go and he followed behind them thus keeping all his students in sight. His most responsible student, Cynthia Macmahon led the class.

Luke wondered what happened regarding his first 'test swap'. He didn't remember anything about it at all. He had mistakenly set the awareness option too high (or is it too low) so that even he wasn't aware of what was swapped or between who.

He checked himself over as best he could, everything seemed perfectly normal. He was still dressed in his professional teaching attire, slacks, button down shirt, tie and comfortable but professional shoes. Nothing was wrong there.

Whatever was changed had to be something slight that didn't matter too much. Luke knew himself, he would never do anything drastic or harmful to any of his students. He was a kind hearted man. He loved his students and couldn't cause them pain.

It was true he would try the R.A.I.D. out on them, but he would make sure that nothing bad would happen. He planned to undo all the swaps before school was out.

For his first swap, at least the first one he would remember, Luke decided on something simple. Something that if it didn't work would be easy to tell without any embarrassment and finally something that wouldn't hurt anyone.

He took out the R.A.I.D. and looked through the options. Miraculously, one of the first choices caught his eye. It was perfect. It was something that wouldn't be a problem with anyone, and was easy to check. He would swap names with one of the students.

The most obvious choice would be little Cynthia who was leading the class.

Since Luke was in the back of everyone he could take the device out and point it at Cynthia without anyone noticing.

Luke discovered that as soon as he took it out, the world stopped. He selected the person he wanted to swap and selected the Name option. The device was activated. There was a flash of light and the world resumed it's shape.

"What is my name?" Luke thought.

He knew it was Cynthia Macmahon, but he thought it should be Luke Finley. He would have to wait until someone addressed him to find out which was his 'real' name.

The class entered the room and start the assignment. Like, now Cynthia settled everyone down and took the attendance. That is where he saw it.

Luke Finley was one of the students, and It was listed as Mr. Macmahon's class. The device worked.

This was even proven to a greater extend, when Cynthia looked at the chalkboard and saw Mr. Macmahon's Do Now clearly written in his own handwriting.

What happens next?

1333231.content:
Cynthia was impressed by the device's power. It was one thing for the device to say it had the power to swap anything. It was another thing to actually see it!

Cynthia had a few minutes before class begin. The teacher sat at his desk thinking about all the things he could do with his newfound power. "This device really can change anything," Cynthia thought. "There's soo much potential." While he was thinking, Cynthia looked over at the Do Now assignment. Cynthia wasn't a fan of these assignments. Do Nows were just busywork that really didn't engage the students. The students got nothing out of them. Now that he thought about, Cynthia realized there was a lot of things in the school he didn't like. Cynthia could change them for the better!

Cynthia started to think about all the ways he’d change the school. All the teacher had to do was remove what he didn’t like. As he thought about it more though, the teacher realized he couldn’t just remove things. Cynthia had to make actual swaps. “This may be a bit harder than I thought.”

Cynthia checked the time. The students were finishing up the Do Now. Cynthia knew he’d have to think about changing the school once he got out of work. The teacher looked down at the device. Maybe it was the device’s influence, but Cynthia really wanted to do some more swaps. “I have to test this baby out to really get the hang of it, right?”

Cynthia looked around the room. “What to swap, what to swap..” There were tons of possibilities. Cynthia could swap anything. While he was thinking, Cynthia looked at the hairstyle of one of his students. Haley had her hair tied back with a bow. The hairstyle made sense. Haley was one of the girly girls in the class.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/f7/11/95/...


“You know what? That’ll be interesting,” Cynthia thought to himself. “Swapping hairstyles with Haley will ramp things up a bit. It’s more than just swapping names.” Cynthia opened his drawer and activated the device. A button push later, the swap was done.

Cynthia looked up at Haley. The girl known for almost always wearing something pink, no longer had her typical girly hairstyle. Instead, the girl had the short brown hair of a young man. The hair had the gel in it that Mr. Macmahon put in it this morning. Of course, now Haley was the one who gelled her hair every morning.

Cynthia watched for a moment to see if anyone noticed the change. Nothing. Haley just went about gossiping with her friends. Everyone thought the girl always had that haircut.

Cynthia felt his own hair. The wavy brown locks rested on his shoulders. Cynthia tugged at it and felt the bow in the back. The teacher shook his head for a little to get a feel for his new hair. Cynthia was fascinated by the swap. Yes, Cynthia was fascinated by how girly he probably looked now. What fascinated Cynthia more though was that he was used to looking this way. The teacher felt like he did his hair in girly hairstyles his whole life. Still, the teacher had this feeling in the back of his mind that he was really supposed to have Haley’s hairstyle.

Cynthia checked the time. The Do Now was over. Time to get to work. Cynthia stood up and approached the front of the classroom. The teacher’s new locks bounced on his shoulders with every step, but no one seemed to care. Cynthia began teaching. With a smirk, he felt the RAID in his pocket. Cynthia still had to get the hang of this device. It was only right to make more swaps.

"Luke, please go to the board and answer the Do Now," Cynthia asked.

Usually Cynthia would ask for a show of hands, but he purposefully wanted to call out and see if the former Cynthia would react like she always had.

Luke picked up notebook and headed towards the board to answer the question.

https://i.pinimg.com/564x/54/f3/26/54f32...

Cynthia marveled at the little girl called Luke answering to what she thought was her name.

While Luke was recording her work on the blackboard, Hailey was talking with her friends. She did this a lot in his class. This gave Luke an idea, he 'stole' her voice and used it to reprimand her.

"Luke, one second please," Cynthia said in his new high pitched girly voice. Then addressing Hailey. "Hailey, are you going to be quiet or will I have to put you in a time out?"

Caught and cowed, Hailey said, "I will."

"You will what?"

"I will, Mr. Macmahon."

"You see that you do." By this time, Luke had finished putting the answer to the problem on the board. She was standing in front of her work. Cynthia exchanged their names back again. The teacher was back to being Luke Finley.

"Can you explain your work Cynthia?" Luke asked.

Neither Cynthia nor the rest of the class noticed that her name had changed. Luke used the opportunity to look at the board again. His name under the Do Now! had changed back to Mr. Finley again. It was of course written in his own handwriting, just as he remembered doing it originally.

https://www.menshairstyletrends.com/wp-c...

Having his hair bounce on his shoulders was a little distracting, so Luke swapped his hair again. Hailey didn't deserve to get her own hair back. So as a punishment, Luke instead of swapping back with little Haley, he swapped his hair with the boy who was sitting next to her, Peter.

Now, Luke's hair was even shorter than it had been, especially on the sides. Peter, of course, now had the long pretty hair that used to belong to Hailey. He didn't see anything wrong with it though. As far as Peter knew his mother always gave him girly hair styles and put lots of bows and ribbons in his hair. He didn't mind at all.

The next hour went off without a hitch. Luke found that teaching with Haley’s voice made things a bit more fun for him. It was fun for him to just go about his day without anyone noticing his new voice. Everyone thought Luke always had the high-pitched squeaky voice of a little girl. A few times Mr. Finley needed to use his stern voice to quiet his students. Luke found this funny. To Luke, his “intimidation” just sounded adorable. To the students, the teacher’s “stern” voice carried the weight of God.

Then that meant Haley had his hairstyle. “Damn. These changes are getting a bit hard to keep track of.”

I’ll have a clean slate to make more swaps.” The teacher also decided that every now and then he’d make a list of his swaps.

Luke began teaching math. The students were doing a review of early multiplication. Today was an especially fun day. Mr. Finley planned a whole jeopardy review game. The students loved these games, especially when Luke got into character as a gameshow host. The students laughed along with Mr. Finley as they got into the game.

Mathew raised his hand to answer a question. “The answer is 16 bloc-“ The student was interrupted by some giggling in the back of the room. Luke shot a glance at the back. The teacher wasn’t surprised to find the chatting was coming from the usual perpetrator.

“Haley,” Luke coughed while tapping the board. Haley got the signal. The girl rolled her eyes and faced back towards the board.

The review game continued. A few minutes later, the game was interrupted again by more giggling. “Please don’t tell me it’s one of those days….” Luke thought. The teacher turned around again to see Haley chatting with one of her friends. “Omg, why won’t she just shut up..”

This was a typical routine in the classroom. Haley would always chat multiple times during class. Luke would always have to do something to make her stay quiet. The teacher tried many things. Sometimes Luke would use signals. Sometimes Luke would take away some of the girl’s privileges. Luke was even working on a behavior plan with Haley to get her to talk less in class. Nothing seemed to be working. To make things more annoying, as the summer approached Haley just started to become disrespectful. In the beginning of the year, Haley would usually apologize for chatting. Haley also tried to work with Mr. Finley to chat less. Things changed though. Now Luke always expected to get an eye roll or a little huff whenever he told Finley to be quiet.

Luke had it. For his own sanity, he needed to do something to put Haley in her place. That’s when Luke remembered the RAID. “I may not get her to stop chatting anytime soon. At least I can give her a little punishment though.” Luke reached into his pocket and pressed a button. A flash of light later, Luke once again had Haley’s voice.

“Are you ready to join us?” Luke said with the sassy voice of the little girl.

“Fineee,” said Haley gruffly. With a little huff that was uncharacteristic of her now manly voice, Haley returned to her work.

“That’ll teach her,” thought Luke.

Luke felt a bit jealous of his students. The students were allowed to wear short-sleeved shirts and shorts that breathed better than the outfit of a teacher. Mr. Finley was stuck wearing a long-sleeved button down and some chinos. “What I wouldn’t do for some new threads right now..”

133323123111.content:
The clock turned 1230. It was time for lunch. The students knew the drill. The children got their things ready for lunch and lined up at the door. Luke positioned himself at the front of the line. If it wasn’t for his size, the teacher could’ve easily been mistaken for one of his students. After all, Luke was wearing a pink shirt that said #LUV and short shorts.

The cough did sound like a little girl trying to get attention. The students got the signal to be quiet. Mr. Finley nodded his head and marched his students down to lunch. Mr. Finley had lunch with the other second grade teachers. Luke enjoyed their company. Being the only man in the group though, he sometimes felt left out of the conversation. Today that was different. Mrs. Davis was really interested in his new outfit.

“I love your outfit,” Mrs. Davis smiled.

Luke’s eyes went wide. Luke wondered if someone actually knew that he swapped. “Umm.. Thanks,” Luke smiled politely.

Luke needed to test Mrs. Davis to see if she actually knew about the swap. “It isn’t anything different than what I normally wear.” Luke was on edge waiting for a response.

“I know that! I’m just interested in where you got it. My daughter would look cute in that.”

Luke breathed a sigh of relief. Mr. Finley then faked a story about buying the outfit at Justice.

The bell rang a little while later. The second grade teachers picked up their classes. The students didn’t return to their normal classrooms though. There was a special assembly happening. Since the whole school was well-behaved for a month, the students were in for a special treat. The students would watch their teachers sing karaoke to songs they picked for them.

Luke knew what song his students had picked for him. The teacher hated it. “I do have the RAID now.. It would be easy af to get out of this..”

Luke didn’t know what other songs the other teachers were singing though. Luke could potentially end up singing a song worse than Let It Go.

Luke decided he’d swap with a student and just enjoy the show. It would be nice to take a break from having to be the responsible one all the time.

“Now who to swap with..” Luke looked around the gym. That’s when it hit him. “I’ll swap lives with Cynthia. She’s such a good student and even wants to be a teacher. I’ll give her a taste of what it’s like as a reward for her good behavior.” Luke pressed the button and the swap was done.

Luke looked around. Nothing felt any different. That’s when the former teacher saw Cynthia walking towards him. Cynthia walked differently than usual. Although the former student was confident, she never really gave off any authority. Some of the mean girls in class would even pick on Cynthia for being a student’s pet. Mr. Finley had to step in so those girls wouldn’t walk all over her. Things were different now. Cynthia walked towards Luke with authority. Luke was a bit taken aback by Cynthia’s new vibe.

“Luke, what are you doing down here? Please go join the other students,” Cynthia said firmly. Luke nodded and went to take his seat in the bleachers.

“Hey, watch it girl! I can’t see!” shouted a boy as he slapped the back of Luke’s head.

“Oww!” Luke turned around to see Mark. Mark was the boy in his class who was the most anti-girl for his age.

“Mark! Keep your hands to yourself!” shouted Luke.

“Yeah?? What are you gonna do about it dweeb,” Mark sneered.

Luke paused for a second. Luke wasn’t the teacher anymore. There really wasn’t anything he could do. Luke also realized he was a lot taller than the rest of the kids. Mark probably really couldn’t see. Luke crotched down to give Mark a better view.

“Don’t worry about him. You know how boys are,” said a little girl to Luke. Luke looked to his right to see it was Cynthia’s best friend, Kiera. Now that Luke swapped lives with Cynthia though, Kiera was now Luke’s best friend.
“Thanks,” Luke smiled. Luke then watched the show with the rest of the students.

Luke was excited to see Cynthia perform. It was interesting to see Cynthia living his life. Cynthia was doing everything exactly how he would. Luke giggled when he saw Cynthia’s visible discomfort at having to sing Let It Go. Cynthia was dreading the song just how he did.

Cynthia was also a good teacher now, just how Luke was. Cynthia would do anything for her students. Cynthia walked on stage and adjusted the mic. The mic had to be dropped a few feet since Cynthia was a lot shorter than the other teachers. Cynthia began singing. The former student’s performance was off at first. After the first few lyrics though, Cynthia decided to just give it her all because she knew her students would enjoy it.

“She’s pretty good haha,” Luke laughed to Kiera.

“Of course you would say that..” The comment came from a familiar voice on Luke’s left. Luke turned to see Haley roll her eyes at him. Haley was one of the mean girls who usually picked on Cynthia. Now Haley was a mean girl who picked on Luke. “You’re SUCH a teacher’s pet.”

“That’s it,” Luke thought to himself. “I didn’t expect to fix her attitude as another student, but that girl definitely needs an attitude adjustment.”

Luke reached into his pocket to grab the RAID. That’s when Luke realized- he didn’t have it anymore! Luke’s eyes went wide when he realized Cynthia must have the RAID now since she swapped lives with Luke.

“We have to get going Luke. If it’s not urgent, can you get back to me tomorrow?”

133323123111132.content:
Luke decided to find out what it was like to live the life of a little girl...at least for one night. Luke already had the voice and clothing to be a little girl anyway.

Luke joined the other students in the line for the bus. He instinctively knew which bus was his now along with several other things that made up his new existance. Luke determined not to do any swaps while living Cynthia's life. He was already involved in a huge change, he should take at easy. At least until he returned to his own life.

Kiera was sitting next to Luke for the ride home. Kiera was talking to him, but Luke wasn't paying attention. He was too excited at what was going to happen. He was going to 'go home and play like a little girl."

Luke couldn't believe it. "As far as everyone was concerned, I AM A LITTLE GIRL! I don't have to do anything but play and it'll be so much fun. I can play with my dolls... or I could also play dress-up and put on all sorts of pretty clothes."

"What I need is someone to play with," Luke thought.

"Kiera, can you come over to my house and play?" Luke asked.

"Yeah, I can come."

"Great! We'll have so much fun!" Luke shouted and he meant it.

Kiera didn't know why her friend was so excited, but it was infectious. Kiera started to smile.

Luke and Kiera picked up their book bags. They got off the stop at the appropriate place. Even though before this Luke hadn't known where Cynthia lived, nor what her mother looked like, he instinctively knew both.

Luke asked his 'Mommy' as he knew he should. "Can Kiera come over and play?"

"No," Mommy said gently.

Luke was taken aback. Why would she say 'No?' "Mommy, please please please. Let her come."

"She can't today."

"But I really want to play."

"She can't come over."

Luke was going to ask again, but he got that look from Mommy that said, don't say another word. Luke knew that look well, he had used it many times before. It was part of his teaching arsenal. Despite that Luke asked one more time. Luke's heart was crushed. He wanted to play like a little girl so badly. But he didn't want to play alone. He needed someone to show him how.

Luke opened his mouth to protest. This time Mommy grabbed Luke by the wrist and pulled him with her. Luke wanted to resist. For a second he did so. That was until Mommy gave him three hard smacks on his backside with her free hand.

"You will come with me and I don't want to hear another word about it," Mommy commanded.

Luke looked into Mommy's eyes again, this time she was clearly mad. He complied immediately. Luke let himself get dragged to his house.

Once inside, Mommy told Luke, "Do your homework right now. I'll be up in fifteen minutes to check on you."

Luke went up to his room. He looked around, it was like heaven to him. He saw a real little girl's room and it was his. Toys, dolls, posters and everything else one would expect were there.

Luke forgot about his homework and instead looked through the room. He ran to his closet and saw all sorts of pretty clothes. He tried to remind himself, that these weren't Cynthia's apparel, they were that other little girl who he swapped clothes with. It didn't matter, right now, it was all his. Everything in this room was his.

He saw a pretty striped party dress. It was all yellow with puffed sleeves and three rosette at the waist. He loved it immediately. He pulled off his shirt and pulled down his denim shorts. They both landed on the floor. Wearing only his panties, he grabbed the dress, unzipped the back zipper and stepped into the dress.

https://www.macys.com/shop/product/good-...

He was trying unsuccessful to pull up the zipper when Mommy entered the room.

"Lucas Kurt Finley what are you doing?" Mommy shouted.

Luke knew he was in big trouble. as he stammered out a few words. "I was j-j-just..."

"Have you finished your homework like I told you to?"

"No," Luke said in even a smaller voice than he had before.

"You know we have an appointment with the dentist today. Put on your regular clothes ."

Luke started to get out of the dress. He was going to let it fall to the ground, like his shirt and shorts before.

Before Lue could do so, "Hang that dress up properly young lady! I'll be back in five minutes. You had better be ready!" Mommy continued angrily.

Luke did as bidden. He was properly dressed when Mommy returned. She had her pocketbook over her shoulder and keys in her hand.

"I told you to do your homework and get ready. Luke you are grounded for one week. You will come home right after school. You won't be allowed to play with your friends...and you will not be going to girl scouts this weekend," Mommy informed Luke.

Luke felt bad for Cynthia. He got her into so much trouble. He didn't think she should pay for his mistakes, but he didn't know what to do.

What happened next?

You didn't believe him. You know how dentists were.

The dentist talked to 'his Mommy' while Luke were out of ear shot. Then Mommy made another appointment for Luke with the receptionist.

Or she could have the little body and clothes of a toddler while she did her daily routine."

The easiest way was to swap their lives, like his had been swapped. But he could also swap their schooling instead. So the adults would be heading off to grammar school. The liquid could be used to summon a demon, familiar spirit, jinn, potions, magic, witch, shaman items, and more.
The liquid works that if you touch the actual liquid, then you have power over it.

151.title: Notebook

1511.content: Adam is walking home alone. He thinks to himself about how bored he is with his life. But then someone bumps into him. He couldn’t tell who it was, except for a fedora and a black trench coat. Adam then notices something, a notebook. He looks over to tell the man he dropped something, but the man is gone. He looks at the cover and it says RAID: a Reality Altering Interface Device. He opens the notebook, but only finds a series of a instructions in 12 languages. Adam becomes curious and thinks that if the guy figures out he dropped it, then he could just buy another notebook. Adam decides to take it home with him. When he arrives, he heads straight for his bedroom and starts reading the instructions. He decides that he should write something to test it, but he has no idea what to write about. He decides to write down either a couple from next door who have been trying for five years to conceive to finally be successful (Helper Path-Meaning that Adam will devote the notebook to helping good people in need of godly aide), use it on the bullies of school and turn them into the nerds, fat people, and gays (Attacker Path-Meaning that Adam will devote the notebook to attacking the people he perceives as evil), or summon the trenchcoat guy or maybe call of friend (Assist Path-whether it’s a friend that wasn’t listed on the previous chapter or the Watcher, Adam will not be the only one with the powers of the notebook).
1511.title: Notebook 1

15111.content:
Adam decides to help out Sam and Jodi Pryde, his neighbors who have been trying to conceive a baby for years. He won’t be able to tell if it worked right away, so he has to wait. Adam’s mom, Hilary, calls him down for dinner. As Adam is having dinner, he tries to think of a more instant thing to do...But what? He decides to try writing down that his hair will become red. It happens, and he decides to not get out of his room for the rest of the day so that his family doesn’t get suspicious. After a couple of days of giving to the less popular people in school an opportunity to become popular, such as having a wallflower guy save a popular girl from tripping into something bad and they start going on dates, Adam helps his twin sister Felicia with her homework. As I help her, she accidentally touches the notebook. But luckily, I didn’t change reality, I just created opportunities, but she will start to notice the details much more. After that, Adam puts the notebook under his mattress, right at the center of it. When, and if, Felicia decides to help, I will find a better hiding place. When he sees embarrassing pictures of a classmate wearing his sisters clothes, Adam goes to him and asks him questions. The answer that he gets is the guy, Brent, wishes he was born a girl. Adam comes up with an idea and writes Brent will become a woman on a piece of the notebook that he has on him. And in a flash of light, Brent becomes Brianna. After school, Felicia goes to Adam. And she says, “What did you do?” And Adam says, “I guess it is something to show you…” And he introduces her to the notebook. And then...

Character updates (This is an update of either new characters or a change in reality)
Adam Mason-A high school sophomore who is just average. But he has some details that most people don’t know about. He is smart, strong, artistic, and charismatic. He is introverted, but he is terrified of the thought of possibly being sociopathic. He has blonde hair and blue eyes. Current owner of the Notebook.

Felicia Mason-Adam’s twin sister. She has auburn hair and grey eyes. She is just a little bit more popular than her brother. She knows the truth of the Notebook.

Hilary Mason-Adam’s mother. She has auburn hair and blue eyes. She is a stay at home mom who is a semi famous writer, but is suffering from writer’s block.

Ryan Mason-Adam’s father. He has blonde hair and grey eyes. He is a struggling real estate agent.

Diana Xavier-A girl that goes to Adam’s school and is a potential romantic interest. She is beautiful with blonde hair and is also very popular, but is a stereotypical dumb blonde.

Sarah Jane Wallace-A girl that goes to Adam’s school and is a potential romantic interest. While she is just as beautiful as Maria, she is the opposite personality wise, and is popular for more than her beauty.

The Watcher-a mysterious man with a long black trenchcoat and a fedora with his face mostly obscured. under the trenchcoat is a business tuxedo with several pockets. He is the previous owner of the notebook. He has lost the notebook.

Sam and Jodi Pryde-Adam’s neighbors who have been trying to conceive for five years. They were the first to be affected by the notebook, and are expecting their first child.

Brent-A classmate of Adam’s who wishes he was born a girl. Adam writes that he becomes Brianna.

1512.content:
Another boring day at the college. Adam sighs at that feels like a dull succession of slow days, mecanically following a daily habit, especially since he doesn't have much friends to begin with, given he's actually a shy boy.
To pass the time, when he didn't had homework to do, the boy liked to draw fantasical universes, imagining being part of some kind of universe where he'd be the hero that fend off monsters and save the day, and, given he didn't had much going on, work-wise, he was idly walking toward home, without really paying attention to its surrounding.

A mysterious man in a black trenchcoat and a fedora was standing there, seemingly scribbling something onto a notebook, before Adam inadvertly bump into him. With a blush, Adam excuse himself, and was about to continue on its way, before the man actually give the notebook to him. For some reasons, Adam accepted it, but before he could ask him about anything, the man wasn't here anymore.

Feeling uneasy about the man's sudden disparition, and scared of being kidnapped and/or harmed, Adam rushes back at his home, half curious of wanting why he got the notebook, and browsing it might give hints of who was the man.

Back at home, he hurriedly goes in his room. On the notebook's cover is written "RAID: Reality Altering Interface Device". A strange title, especially there is nothing else on it. You open it. On the first page is written:

"This artefact has the power of bending and changing the reality as you currently know. DO NOT let in fall in wrong hands.

Rules:
1- Any phrase which contain the words 'wish', 'need' or 'want' will cause the reality to change to fit the phrase as a rule and/or a true fact.
2- Writing a set time on a phrase will allow for it to remain, until the cooldown is off. Then it will be automatically erased.
3- Erasing a phrase will cancel all the effects that occured in reality.
4- You can't harm or kill yourself in any manner through direct or indirect means caused by the notebook. UNLESS YOU AREN'T THE OWNER OF THE BOOK ANYMORE. You've been warned.
5- Telling someone about the notebook's effects and/or powers will cause the person to be aware of the reality change, if applicable/noticeable.
6- Writing 'Reset' in the notebook will erase all the content, aside from the intro and rules.
7- The notebook's size can be changed. So can be the writings in it, aside from thoses mentionned in 6. Also the rules of ot can't be changed in any way.
"

A small note is also written..: 'Don't abuse of its powers. People have been seeking it for long.'. You notice that the rest of the notebook is blank.
1512.title: Notebook 2

choices: Get to know what changed. (Eventually with/being your dragon)
Try the notebook, and eventually shrinle dragon smaller.
15121.content:
You laugh softly. You couldn't believe that the notebook could have any special powers, let alone to change the world! Nethertheless, you liked the attention. It had brightened your day. As a test, you write up, 'I'd wish my best friend is a friendly white feral dragon that i can understand and whose big belly is comfy do i could sleep on it.'. It is childish, and you doubt that it'd become true, but you couldn't be helped but to hope that your parents would read it, so they'd buy you a dragon plush, and maybe be in an happy family again.
The rest of the day was uneventful, if you exclude that looming shadow that you spotted through a window. Given nothing special was in sight, you shrug it off, eventually going to bed.

As you sleep, you start to dream: A gentle, huge, scaled and clawed hand open one of the window of your room, so it could grab you. Outside, it was still night. Yet, you could see that it was a large dragon, white of skin, a size of 60 ft tall and 200 ft long, tail included, and bolstering a large, plushy belly. It gently headrubs you, before it lays down on the ground, rather heavily, neatly placing you between its tail and belly. It yawns and closes its eyes, before your mind drift off away in more dreams.

You wake up and stretch, before getting your hands onto your bed, thinking about what happened yesterday, when you notice you weren't in your bed anymore. You hurriedly get off your makeshift bed, before you trip onto the ground. Thankfully, you didn't get wounded, but the fall was painful enough to make you notice that you weren't dreaming anymore. As your peer up, you also notice that the dragon, just waking up, is as real as you are. It yawns, then it nuzzles you. You smile and rub its snout gently.
Then you notice the notebook. For some reasons, you had brung it with you, making you wonder what to do.

You could explore around with your new friend, eventually getting to know it better, and maybe change it a bit with the notebook. It wouldn't necessary stop you from going into the college nor having a normal life, if only to know what changed.
Out of curiosity, you could also try that, while becoming/swapping of body with the dragon, or as being its mate.

Or you could 'reset' the notebook, to start fresh. Or merely make the dragon less invasive, and try the notebook again.
15121.title: Friendly scaled dream friend
